last_episode_to_air.name: Last Resort
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mike and Alison receive an incredible offer far beyond their expectations. They must make a decision, the result of which will change their lives forever.

name: Ghosts
overview: A cash-strapped young couple inherits a grand country house, only to find it is both falling apart and teeming with the ghosts of former inhabitants.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: Cash-strapped Alison and Mike think their dreams have come true when they inherit a grand country house, unaware that it's falling apart and teeming with the ghosts of former inhabitants...

seasons.name: Series 2
seasons.overview: Alison and Mike are trying to find a semi-harmonious routine with the ghostly housemates of Button House.

seasons.name: Series 3
seasons.overview: Alison and Mike are working hard to bring their new 'guest house' plans to fruition.

seasons.name: Series 4
seasons.overview: Alison and Mike try to make a success of their humble B&B.

episodes.name: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.overview: A young couple, struggling to buy a first home, think their prayers are answered when a distant relative bequeaths them a vast country house. The catch? It’s riddled with ghosts…

episodes.name: Gorilla War
episodes.overview: When the ghostly visions return to haunt Alison, Mike must reassure her that there is a rational, medical explanation – a comforting theory about which he could not be more wrong.

episodes.name: Happy Death Day
episodes.overview: With Pat’s family coming to commemorate his death, Pat begs Alison to pass on a message from beyond the grave, while she attempts to befriend the new builder.

episodes.name: Free Pass
episodes.overview: Desperate for cash, Mike and Alison rent the house to a film crew making a period drama – a move that pushes both Thomas and the old house’s floorboards to breaking point.

episodes.name: Moonah Ston
episodes.overview: Alison’s attempt to win over their posh new neighbours with a swanky dinner party are thrown into chaos by Mary’s woeful catering and Robin’s desire to celebrate the lunar eclipse.

episodes.name: Getting Out
episodes.overview: When Mike and Alison consider selling Button House to a hotel chain, the ghosts come up with some get-rich-quick schemes to help the cash-strapped couple.

1.name: Series 1
1.overview: Cash-strapped Alison and Mike think their dreams have come true when they inherit a grand country house, unaware that it's falling apart and teeming with the ghosts of former inhabitants...

episodes.name: The Grey Lady
episodes.overview: Alison and Mike are trying to find a semi-harmonious routine with the ghostly housemates of Button House. The ghosts have found a way to make their new situation work for them, while the couple are working towards a new money-making venture.

episodes.name: About Last Night
episodes.overview: After a night of partying, Alison and Mike scramble to clean up the house for a venue viewing, and Alison tries to find out why the ghosts are acting so strangely.

episodes.name: Redding Weddy
episodes.overview: Alison and Mike grapple with the latest obstacle to nailing down an event booking, but they’re stymied by the Captain’s past coming back to haunt him.

episodes.name: The Thomas Thorne Affair
episodes.overview: Thomas goes down memory lane with Alison, however, the truth is muddied when the other ghosts tell their version of events. Mike struggles with his own memories of Alison’s past.

episodes.name: Bump in the Night
episodes.overview: It’s a nervous Mike’s first night alone in the house when some uninvited guests set the ghosts on a mission to defend their treasured home.

episodes.name: Perfect Day
episodes.overview: The big day at Button House has arrived, but some freak weather disrupts everyone’s plans.

2.name: Series 2
2.overview: Alison and Mike are trying to find a semi-harmonious routine with the ghostly housemates of Button House.

episodes.name: The Bone Plot
episodes.overview: When a documentary team comes to Button House to investigate a historical assassination plot, Alison and the ghosts are shocked to discover that it involved one of their own.

episodes.name: A Lot to Take In
episodes.overview: A mysterious visitor arrives at Button House with a revelation that leaves Alison reeling. Mike has an epiphany on his first day at a new job, which causes Julian to remember his first day as a ghost.

episodes.name: The Woodworm Men
episodes.overview: While Button House is being fumigated for woodworm, Alison and Mike decide to save some money and camp in the grounds, sending the ghosts’ routines off kilter.

episodes.name: I Love Lucy
episodes.overview: Alison has invited Lucy to come to Button House for a sleepover, but after a concerning meeting with the solicitor, Alison must work out if Lucy is really who she says she is.

episodes.name: Something To Share?
episodes.overview: When the ghosts try to sabotage Alison’s makeshift therapy session for Kitty, they unwittingly face their own demons. And Mike’s desire to see the ghosts yields surprising results

episodes.name: Part of the Family
episodes.overview: While Alison and Mike gear up to make a big investment, the Captain and Kitty work together with the other ghosts to solve an unfolding mystery before it’s too late.

3.name: Series 3
3.overview: Alison and Mike are working hard to bring their new 'guest house' plans to fruition.

episodes.name: Happy Holiday
episodes.overview: Mike and Alison welcome their first guests to the B&B, determined to get a five-star review. The Plaguers idolise Thomas, and Pat teaches Mary the joys and pitfalls of package holidays.

episodes.name: Speak as ye choose
episodes.overview: Mary tells Julian how she finally found her voice, while Thomas decides he must finally kick his Alison addiction. Old friends of Mike share the surprising secret to their success.

episodes.name: The Hardest Word
episodes.overview: Can the Ghosts get back into Alison’s good books after she gives them the biggest telling off of their lives/deaths? Alison and Mike learn that relaxation is harder than it looks.

episodes.name: Gone Gone
episodes.overview: Shocking news rocks Button House and a booking mix-up sees Mike and Alison forced to host a last-minute children’s party that they are utterly unprepared for.

episodes.name: Poached Guests
episodes.overview: Alison and Mike’s neighbour spots a business opportunity which sparks all out war between them. The Captain makes a discovery and the Ghosts find a surprising new friend.

episodes.name: Not Again
episodes.overview: Mike and Alison reach boiling point over the B&B. Julian aims to prove he is more selfless than people think. A new addition triggers frightening flashbacks for Robin.

4.name: Series 4
4.overview: Alison and Mike try to make a success of their humble B&B.

episodes.name: Fools
episodes.overview: With the B&B gone, Mike anxiously strives to fix their finances, but it’s April Fools' Day, and a distracted Alison is out for revenge. The couple receive some life-changing news.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Mike is feeling intense anxiety about the future. The couple look into selling some land, incensing Lady Button. Can Thomas finally become a published poet?

episodes.name: Pineapple Day
episodes.overview: Alison and Mike invite Barclay to discuss the land sale but are quickly forced to play hardball. Meanwhile, the ghosts become fixated on solving the mystery of Kitty’s death.

episodes.name: En Français
episodes.overview: Having lost their appetite for Food Club, the ghosts trial some new entertainment inspired by Pat. Disaster strikes as Mike and Alison host an important guest at Button House.

episodes.name: Carpe Diem
episodes.overview: Robin has a revelation that unnerves the ghosts and prompts them to consider their legacies. Alison and Mike decide to have a spontaneous wild night out.

episodes.name: Last Resort
episodes.overview: Mike and Alison receive an incredible offer far beyond their expectations. They must make a decision, the result of which will change their lives forever.
